definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: A wireline bailer that is used to remove sand and debris from the bottom of a well.
sentences.chinese: 从井底去除砂子和碎片所用的由钢丝绳起下的捞砂筒。

sentences.english: The gravel frequently is sieved and graded sand that is packed in bags.
sentences.chinese: 砾石通常是经过筛析和粒度分级的袋装砂子。

sentences.english: She sifted the sand out from the rice.
sentences.chinese: 她把大米中的砂子筛选掉。

sentences.english: Silane coupling agents are also used in many commercial sand-epoxy-type composites.
sentences.chinese: 硅烷偶联剂亦用于许多通用的砂子环氧型复合材料中。

sentences.english: The earth itself was the finest sand, but blue as the flame of burning sulphur.
sentences.chinese: 地上全是最细的砂子，但是蓝得像硫黄发出的光焰。

sentences.english: But the small mines have been closed down and the quartz is almost finished.
sentences.chinese: 可现在小矿场都关了，砂子也差不多用完了。

sentences.english: Research on the Synthesis and Performance of MAPP Used as Coupling Agent of Wood-polypropylene Composites;
sentences.chinese: 硅烷偶联剂亦用于许多通用的砂子环氧型复合材料中。

sentences.english: A wireline device that is used to remove sand or debris from the bottom of the wellbore.
sentences.chinese: 从井底去除砂子或碎片所用的用钢丝绳起下的装置。

sentences.english: You should mix the sand, the water in just proportions.
sentences.chinese: 你应按正确的比例混合砂子和水。
